item.description: We’ve been here before and they’re looking forward to our visiting again. Enjoy delicious hors d’oeuvres and chat with old and new friends! There is no charge. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 42 Century Drive: I 84W to Exit 31 West Street (Rt. 229), end of ramp turn right onto Rt. 229S, go 3 miles (9 lights), facility on left.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Happy Hour
